Package src.controller

Class ReservationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.controller.ReservationManager
  • public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    RservationManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - HotelAppView and ReservationView and the model classes - Reservation, Guest and Room.

    It can create and update reservation with the help of GuestManager and RoomManager.

    Since:
    2022-04-04

      • createReservation

        public static void createReservation​(java.lang.String checkedInDate,
                                     java.lang.String checkedOutDate,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> guestIds,
                                     java.lang.String roomId,
                                     int numberOfPax,
                                     ReservationStatus reservationStatus,
                                     RoomStatus roomStatus)
        A method that creates reservation.

        See ReservationStatus for different types of Reservation Status.

        See RoomStatus for different types of Room Status.

        Parameters:
        checkedInDate - the date which the guest checked in
        checkedOutDate - the date which the guest checked out
        guestIds - Ids of the guests
        roomId - Id of the room
        numberOfPax - number of people staying in one room
        reservationStatus - status of the reservation
        roomStatus - room status of the reserved room

      • removeReservation

        public static boolean removeReservation​(java.lang.String reservationId)
        A method that removes reservation from database.

        See RoomManager for more room management details.

        See Database for more details about database.

        Parameters:
        reservationId - Id of the reservation
        Returns:
        true is removes successfully. Otherwise, false if reservation id does not exist.

        A method that validates reservation by reservation Id.
        Parameters:
        reservationId - Id of the reservation
        Returns:
        true if reservation is found in database. Otherwise, false if reservation id does not exist.

                                          java.lang.String date)
        A method that updates checked in date of reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservationId - Id of the reservtion
        date - the date which the guest checked in
        Returns:
        true if updating of check in date is successful. Otherwise, false if the check in date is later than the check out date / reservation not found

      • updateCheckedOutDate

                                           java.lang.String date)
        A method that updates checked out date of reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservationId - Id of the reservation
        date - the date which the guest checked out
        Returns:
        true if updating of check out date is successful. Otherwise, false if the check out date is earlier than the check in date.

        Parameters:
        reservationId - Id of the reservation
        guestIds - Ids of the guests
        Returns:
